pullRequest.title: SWTBot Test case for FEA exports and imports with Excel
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed a bug with the destination field in the export and import wizards (Filling the destination field via keyboard did not correctly update the finish flags for the wizard)
Fixed a bug in the importing of interface ends without a specified type (they used to be rejected by the importer)
Implemented test case that exports an element to a excel file, makes a local change in the data model, then reimports the excel file and then checks that the change is gone again.

Closes #744

commit.message:
Fixed bug disabling finish button incorrectly - (Task #744)

- Changing the destination field via keyboard (and not via the file
dialogue) did not set the flag for finishing the wizard
- Added a change listener to the destination field to check for any
changes no matter if they come from the file dialog or by keyboard

---
Task #744: SWTBot Test Case for FEA Excel Export

Fixed importing of interface ends without type - (Task #744)

- The validator rejected importing interface ends without a specified
type in the excel sheet.
- No specified type is no associated with interface type "null"

---
Task #744: SWTBot Test Case for FEA Excel Export

Created test case for excel export and import of FEA - (Task #744)

- Created test case that exports an element to excel, makes a change in
the data model, re-imports the excel file and then checks that the data
model change is gone again

---
Task #744: SWTBot Test Case for FEA Excel Export

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't it be source file instead of destination?

commit.message:
Added missing excel plugins to swtbot manifest plugin - (Task #744)


---
Task #744: SWTBot Test Case for FEA Excel Export
